verses.verse: Now these are the divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron. <S%H175><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron; <S%H175><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>

But Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their father, <S%H25><s%> and had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> children: <S%H1121><s%> therefore Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%> executed the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office.

And David <S%H1732><s%> distributed <S%H2505><s%> them, both Zadok <S%H6659><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> according to their offices <S%H6486><s%> in their service. <S%H5656><s%>

And there were more <S%H7227><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men <S%H1397><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> and thus were they divided. <S%H2505><s%> Among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> there were sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Thus were they divided <S%H2505><s%> by lot, <S%H1486><s%> one <S%H428><s%> sort with another; for the governors <S%H8269><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and governors <S%H8269><s%> of the house of God, <S%H430><s%> were of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>

And Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the scribe, <S%H5608><s%> one of the Levites, <S%H3878><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> and the princes, <S%H8269><s%> and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiathar, <S%H54><s%> and before the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and Levites: <S%H3881><s%> one <S%H259><s%> principal <S%H1><s%> household <S%H1004><s%> being taken <S%H270><s%> for Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and one taken <S%H270><s%> for Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>
Now the first <S%H7223><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to Jehoiarib, <S%H3080><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> to Jedaiah, <S%H3048><s%>
The third <S%H7992><s%> to Harim, <S%H2766><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%> to Seorim, <S%H8188><s%>
The fifth <S%H2549><s%> to Malchijah, <S%H4441><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> to Mijamin, <S%H4326><s%>
The seventh <S%H7637><s%> to Hakkoz, <S%H6976><s%> the eighth <S%H8066><s%> to Abijah, <S%H29><s%>
The ninth <S%H8671><s%> to Jeshuah, <S%H3442><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> to Shecaniah, <S%H7935><s%>
The eleventh <S%H6240><s%> to Eliashib, <S%H475><s%> the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Jakim, <S%H3356><s%>
The thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Huppah, <S%H2647><s%> the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Jeshebeab, <S%H3434><s%>
The fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Bilgah, <S%H1083><s%> the sixteenth <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Immer, <S%H564><s%>
The seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Hezir, <S%H2387><s%> the eighteenth <S%H6240><s%> to Aphses, <S%H6483><s%>
The nineteenth <S%H8672><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Pethahiah, <S%H6611><s%> the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Jehezekel, <S%H3168><s%>
The one <S%H259><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Gamul, <S%H1577><s%>
The three <S%H7969><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Delaiah, <S%H1806><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Maaziah. <S%H4590><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the orderings <S%H6486><s%> of them in their service <S%H5656><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> according to their manner, <S%H4941><s%> under Aaron <S%H175><s%> their father, <S%H25><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him.

And the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> were these: Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Amram; <S%H6019><s%> Shubael: <S%H7619><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shubael; <S%H7619><s%> Jehdeiah. <S%H3165><s%>
Concerning Rehabiah: <S%H7345><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rehabiah, <S%H7345><s%> the first <S%H7218><s%> was Isshiah. <S%H3449><s%>
Of the Izharites; <S%H3325><s%> Shelomoth: <S%H8013><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomoth; <S%H8013><s%> Jahath. <S%H3189><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron; Jeriah <S%H3404><s%> the first, Amariah <S%H568><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%> Jekameam <S%H3360><s%> the fourth. <S%H7243><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel; <S%H5816><s%> Michah: <S%H4318><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Michah; <S%H4318><s%> Shamir. <S%H8053><s%>
The brother <S%H1730><s%> of Michah <S%H4318><s%> was Isshiah: <S%H3449><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Isshiah; Zechariah. <S%H2148><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> were Mahli <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi: <S%H4187><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jaaziah; <S%H3269><s%> Beno. <S%H1121><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> by Jaaziah; <S%H3269><s%> Beno, <S%H1121><s%> and Shoham, <S%H7719><s%> and Zaccur, <S%H2139><s%> and Ibri. <S%H5681><s%>
Of Mahli <S%H4249><s%> came Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> who had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>
Concerning Kish: <S%H7027><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> was Jerahmeel. <S%H3396><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> also of Mushi; <S%H4187><s%> Mahli, <S%H4249><s%> and Eder, <S%H5740><s%> and Jerimoth. <S%H3406><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> likewise <S%H1571><s%> cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> over <S%H5980><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> and Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> and Ahimelech, <S%H288><s%> and the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and Levites, <S%H3881><s%> even the principal <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> over <S%H5980><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their younger <S%H6996><s%> brothers. <S%H251><s%>
